div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
üéØ GOAL: Measure AI Impact
Question: 'Is AI actually making us more productive?'
Traditional metrics (AI tool usage %) don't answer this.
We need: Augmentation Factor

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
AUGMENTATION FACTOR FORMULA
Augmentation Factor = (Human+AI Output) / (Human-Only Output)
Examples:
‚Ä¢ 1.0x = No change (AI not helping)
‚Ä¢ 1.3x = 30% improvement (good)
‚Ä¢ 2.0x = 2x improvement (excellent)
‚Ä¢ 0.8x = 20% worse (AI hurting productivity)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
STEP 1: BASELINE (Human-Only)
Measure performance BEFORE AI:
Example: Sales Rep
‚Ä¢ Deals closed per month: 10
‚Ä¢ Average deal size: $50K
‚Ä¢ Win rate: 20%
‚Ä¢ Time spent per deal: 40 hours
Total output: 10 deals/month

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
STEP 2: DEPLOY AI
Introduce AI agents:
‚Ä¢ LeadScoring-Agent (auto-qualifies leads)
‚Ä¢ ProposalGenerator-Agent (creates proposals)
‚Ä¢ EmailSequencer-Agent (automates follow-ups)
Wait 1-3 months for adoption

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
STEP 3: MEASURE (Human+AI)
Measure performance AFTER AI:
Example: Same Sales Rep
‚Ä¢ Deals closed per month: 13
‚Ä¢ Average deal size: $60K (upsell agent)
‚Ä¢ Win rate: 25% (better lead scoring)
‚Ä¢ Time spent per deal: 25 hours (AI automates prep)
Total output: 13 deals/month

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
STEP 4: CALCULATE AUGMENTATION FACTOR
Augmentation Factor = 13 / 10 = 1.3x
Interpretation: AI made this rep 30% more productive
Other metrics improved too:
‚Ä¢ Deal size: +20% ($50K ‚Üí $60K)
‚Ä¢ Win rate: +25% (20% ‚Üí 25%)
‚Ä¢ Time per deal: -38% (40h ‚Üí 25h)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Sales Rep
Baseline: 10 deals/month
With AI: 13 deals/month
Augmentation: 1.3x
AI helps with:
‚Ä¢ Lead qualification
‚Ä¢ Proposal generation
‚Ä¢ Email sequences

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Software Engineer
Baseline: 40 story points/sprint
With AI: 56 story points/sprint
Augmentation: 1.4x
AI helps with:
‚Ä¢ Code generation (Copilot)
‚Ä¢ Test writing
‚Ä¢ Code reviews

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Finance Analyst
Baseline: 500 invoices/month
With AI: 2,000 invoices/month
Augmentation: 4.0x
AI helps with:
‚Ä¢ Invoice processing (85% automated)
‚Ä¢ Reconciliation
‚Ä¢ Forecasting

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Customer Success Rep
Baseline: 50 customers managed
With AI: 100 customers managed
Augmentation: 2.0x
AI helps with:
‚Ä¢ Tier 1 support (chatbot)
‚Ä¢ Health scoring
‚Ä¢ Proactive outreach

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
COMPANY-WIDE AUGMENTATION FACTOR
Formula: Revenue per Employee
Before AI:
‚Ä¢ Revenue: $10M
‚Ä¢ Employees: 100
‚Ä¢ Rev/Employee: $100K
After AI (12 months):
‚Ä¢ Revenue: $15M
‚Ä¢ Employees: 110 (only +10%)
‚Ä¢ Rev/Employee: $136K
Company Augmentation: 1.36x
(36% more output per person)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
TRACK MONTHLY
Month 1: 1.05x (early adoption)
Month 2: 1.10x
Month 3: 1.15x
Month 6: 1.25x
Month 12: 1.36x
Goal: 1.3-1.5x within 12 months

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
SET AI-NATIVE OKRs
Objective: Increase productivity with AI
Key Results:
‚Ä¢ KR1: Company augmentation factor ‚â•1.3x
‚Ä¢ KR2: Sales augmentation factor ‚â•1.3x
‚Ä¢ KR3: Engineering augmentation factor ‚â•1.4x
‚Ä¢ KR4: Finance augmentation factor ‚â•3.0x
These tie AI adoption to business outcomes

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
‚ö†Ô∏è COMMON PITFALLS
‚ùå Measuring AI usage % instead of output
('80% of team uses ChatGPT' ‚â† productivity gain)
‚ùå Not measuring baseline (no comparison)
‚ùå Cherry-picking metrics (only show wins)
‚ùå Ignoring quality (output ‚Üë but quality ‚Üì)
‚úÖ Always measure: Output, Quality, Time
